headline: What Disney's OpenAI partnership could mean for ads
summary: Disney (DIS) will be making a $1 billion equity investment into OpenAI (OPAI.PVT), reaching an agreement to become the first major content licensing partner with the artificial intelligence firm's Sora AI video-generating platform. MNTN (MNTN) CEO Mark Douglas reacts to this news and how this type of AI content could change the marketing landscape and how ads are used. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend.
